attributes.action: scrap all mps local councellors expence and claiming for second homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i thing all mps ministers local councellors extra expences should all be scraped and all the millions in total they have put to good causes and the uk people given a bit of a break on extra taxes hopefully a TAX CUT?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
